creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: small procession of five laborers crossing a wooden bridge; two of the men at center carry an enclosed palanquin; row of buildings at center; two women at opposite end of bridge advertise their business; larger procession approaches bridge at center; large, tree-topped hill at UR; wetlands at L with two laborers
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

R marg ULQ; upper center
title: Hodogaya, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
